page.description: Fetches the first record in the current selection of records.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.FETCH_FIRST() method moves to the first record in the current query.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script is attached to a button. It moves to the first record in the current query:
This script is attached to a button. It moves to the first record in the embedded browse (called Items) on a form:
